alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 25 at 4:19PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Including the following area, southeast Copper River Basin including McCarthy and Chitina and along McCarthy Road. * WHEN...Through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A storm system will approach the region today with periods of moderate to heavy rain possible from this evening through Saturday afternoon. Expected rainfall totals: 0.75 To 1.25 inches of rainfall expected. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
